label: Dental Supplies
description: Products and equipment used in dental practices.

subcategories.label: Dental Instruments
subcategories.description: Tools used by dentists to examine, manipulate, restore, and remove teeth and surrounding oral structures.

subcategories.label: Dental Materials
subcategories.description: Substances used to restore or replace teeth and surrounding oral structures.

subcategories.label: Dental Equipment
subcategories.description: Tools and machines used in dental practices.

subcategories.label: Dental Consumables
subcategories.description: Disposable items used in dental practices.

subcategories.label: Dental Lab Supplies
subcategories.description: Materials and equipment used in dental laboratories.
